tag¶

Tag controller

class spam.controllers.tag.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing tags.

In addition to the standard REST verbs this controller defines the following REST-like methods:

  • remove (remove())
get_all(taggable_id)¶

Return a html fragment with a list of tags for this object.

get_delete(tag_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(taggable_id, tag_id)¶

This method is currently unused, but is needed for the RESTController to work.

new(taggable_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

post(taggable_id, tagids=[], new_tags=None)¶

Add tags to a taggable obect.

post_delete(tag_id)¶

Delete a tag.

remove(taggable_id, tagids=[])¶

Remove tags from an object.
